text:
Emma Stone may be the next Cruella

Actor Emma Stone is in early negotiations for the role of Cruella de Vil in the upcoming 101 Dalmations, according to a report in Us magazine .

The live-action spin-off of the classic 1961 film is currently being written by Kelly Marcel. No director has been finalised yet.

Glenn Close last portrayed the Dalmatian-stealing madwoman, who was originally voiced by Betty Lou Gerson. — ANI
title: Emma Stone to be the next Cruella in '101 Dalmatians'
